title: Personal Portfolio Website
shortDescription: A responsive website showcasing my projects.
longDescription: This portfolio was built using React and CSS to demonstrate my web development skills. It includes dynamic project cards, a responsive layout, and interactive animations to enhance user engagement.

title: E-commerce App
shortDescription: An online shopping platform with advanced features.
longDescription: This e-commerce application enables users to browse products, add items to their cart, and complete secure transactions. The backend is powered by Node.js and MongoDB for efficient data management.

title: Blog Platform
shortDescription: A platform for creating and sharing blog posts.
longDescription: This blogging platform allows users to create, edit, and delete posts with a user-friendly interface. Built with Django and styled using Bootstrap, the app provides a clean and functional design.
